text: O vy, kotoryye uverovali! K vam prishol poslannik Mukhammad - da blagoslovit yego Allakh i privetstvuyet! - s Istinoy ot vashego Boga. Uveruyte v etu Istinu - eto luchshe dlya vas, dlya vashego blaga! A yesli zhe vy ne uveruyete, Allakhu ne nuzhna vasha vera. Yemu prinadlezhit vso, chto v nebesakh i na zemle. Allakh Mudr i ob"yemlet dela vsyakoy tvari. On - Vseob"yemlyushchiy Tvorets i upravlyayet vsem. Poistine, Allakh mudr: nagradit delayushchikh dobro i nakazhet delayushchikh zlo
